name: template-fullstack
description: project template for the React-Express-MySQL cursus in Wild Code School

scripts.setup: npm i && npm --prefix ./frontend i && npm --prefix ./backend i && npm run migrate
scripts.dev: concurrently -n front,back -c green,yellow -t "HH:mm:ss" -p "{name} {time}" "npm --prefix ./frontend run dev" "npm --prefix ./backend run dev"
scripts.lint: npm --prefix ./frontend run lint && npm --prefix ./backend run lint
scripts.fix: npm --prefix ./frontend run fix && npm --prefix ./backend run fix
scripts.build: npm i && npm --prefix ./frontend i && npm --prefix ./backend i && npm run --prefix ./frontend build

author: Wild Code School
